subject: Re: Comparing the Perl encrypted files
body:
I think he wants to compare two Perl scripts that have been rendered
to binary in the form that the ByteLoader would use.

On 6/15/07, Chas Owens  wrote:
> On 6/15/07, sivasakthi  wrote:
> > I have mentioned the binary Perl files by encrypted Perl files.. is it
> > not right one?
snip
> Do you want to compare two binary files to see if they have the same contents?

--
